content: learn how to make a simple yet beautiful crochet summer bag the file contains instructions on how to make a perfect bag without sewing this is a digital pdf file with instructions on how to make the bag and the strap written in english it includes materials suggestions and a crochet diagram the button instructions are not included in the pattern in case of any troubles feel free to dm me and i m sure i will be able to help you ========================= to make this item you will be able to know some basic crocheting skills including - how to make a magic_ring - single double and half-double_crochet - slip stitches us terms
